 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרַק‎</span> **verb** ==hiss==, perhaps also ==whistle, pipe== (Late Hebrew ***id., hiss*** (dubious), Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁרֵיק‎</span> ***id.*** [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Lev.2.15|Lev 2:15]]; [[Lev.2.16|Lev 2:16]], <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; — from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> comes Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σῦριγξ</span> according to [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Abh GGW xxvi. 38</sup> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw.165</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.5.26|Isa 5:26]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁרֹק‎</span> [[Isa.7.18|Isa 7:18]] + ([[Job.27.23|Job 27:23]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁרְקוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁרְקָה‎</span> [[Zech.10.8|Zech 10:8]] — ***hiss***, as signal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject: [[Isa.5.26|Isa 5:26]]; [[Isa.7.18|Isa 7:18]]; [[Zech.10.1|Zech 10:1]] in derision, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> civitat., etc. (often + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֵם‎</span> ***be astounded***), [[Jer.19.8|Jer 19:8]]; [[Jer.49.17|Jer 49:17]]; [[Jer.50.13|Jer 50:13]]; [[Lam.2.15|Lam 2:15]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיעַ ראֹשׁ‎</span>), [[Ezek.27.36|Ezek 27:36]] absolute [[Zeph.2.15|Zeph 2:15]]; [[Lam.2.16|Lam 2:16]]; [[1Kgs.9.8|1Kgs 9:8]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַק שֵׁן‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Job.27.23|Job 27:23]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local). 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁרק‎</span> ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁרֵיק‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרַק‎</span> ***hiss, whistle*** (onomatopoetic).
